article_node.title: Actelis Networks Announces Launch of GigaLine 9000 Solution for Large-Scale Building Connectivity Applications
article_node.summary: Actelis Networks has unveiled its GigaLine 9000 hybrid‑fiber solution, enabling gigabit connectivity in large buildings by upgrading existing copper and coax infrastructure. The system targets the multi‑billion‑dollar in‑building connectivity market and aims to make U.S. Federal BEAD Program funding more efficient by reducing the need for costly fiber buildouts. With rapid, low‑capital deployment and scalable architecture, Actelis positions the GL9000 for U.S. and European markets, offering a cost‑effective alternative to traditional fiber installations.
